name: Adventure Medical Kits Day Tripper Lite First Aid Kit
categories: Day Tripper Lite First Aid Kit
description: A grab-and-go first aid kit that is ready for your next day hike. Be ready for trailside cuts and scrapes with the Day Tripper Lite. Designed for 1-2 people out on day hikes, this kit takes cares of first aid essentials, with different compartments: wound care/burn/blister and cuts and scrapes/medication.Includes a bilingual wilderness first aid guide.Designed for 2 people on 1-day adventures.Compact zippered case has quick-reference guide printed on the back, so you know where to find what you need when you need it.Internal pockets are labeled (wound care/burn/blister and cuts and scrapes/medication) making off-grid care easier and more instinctual.Precut moleskin patches help you get back on the trail faster and stop blisters before they start.After Bite® wipes help take the edge off bug bites and allergic reactions.Reflective mountain logo makes the first aid bag easier to find in low-light.Please note that MEC sells the International version of this kit. Contents may vary slightly from the US versions described on the vendor's website.
